meanings.definition: Pain along the inner edge of the shinbone.
meanings.sent1: After running too much, she developed shinsplints and had to rest.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often get shinsplints from overtraining or improper footwear.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his shinsplints were protesting against his new running routine.
meanings.sent4: The shinsplints felt like tiny hammers tapping on his leg bones.
meanings.sent5: The sharp shinsplints made each step feel like walking on hot coals.

meanings.definition: Inflammation of the muscles, tendons, and bone tissue around the tibia.
meanings.sent1: Her doctor recommended rest and ice to help with the shinsplints.
meanings.sent2: Shinsplints can be quite painful and may require medical attention.
meanings.sent3: The marathon runner blamed his shinsplints on wearing old sneakers.
meanings.sent4: The shinsplints throbbed like a drumbeat against her lower leg.
meanings.sent5: The persistent shinsplints felt like a constant ache in her shin.
